TextLibrary.Text: Travel to Degani Prime to discuss their problem.
Ask about the Pirate
The Degani won't sell you food.
You aren't feared enough by pirates.
Purchase some Squid Soup from Degani VII.
Buy Squid Soup (500 Credits)
The next food item is on Aquarius IV
The Degani won't sell you food.
You aren't feared enough by pirates.
Purchase some Ruby Curry from Aquarius IV.
Buy Ruby Curry (1000 Credits)
The next food item is on Tucana V
The Keck won't sell you food.
You aren't feared enough by pirates.
Purchase some Translucent Pufferfish from Tucana V.
Buy Translucent Pufferfish (2000 Credits)
The next food item is on Elea VII
The Elysians won't sell you food.
You aren't feared enough by pirates.
Purchase some Chocolate Quail from Elea VII.
Buy Chocolate Quail (4000 Credits)
The next food item is on Earth
Lumina won't sell you food.
You aren't feared enough by pirates.
Purchase some Beer-Basted Sushi from Earth.
Buy Beer-Basted Sushi (8000 Credits)
The last food item is on Mars
Lumina won't sell you food.
You aren't feared enough by pirates.
Buy a Bran Muffin from Mars.
Buy a Bran Muffin (5 Credits)
Now lay in wait for the Pirate near Lepus VI
Lay in wait for the Pirate near Lepus VI.
Wait for the Pirate
Pirate Destroyed -- Return to Degani Prime
Return to Degani Prime for your reward.
Report your Success
You are given the Psi-Device as well as 300 tons of grain?
